parsers
Class XMLGetter

java.lang.Object
  parsers.XMLGetter

public class XMLGetter
extends java.lang.Object

Creates a Getter that get the XML information form the server.

This class uses the Singleton Pattern, thus, only one instance of it is allowed All the information that we need on the server get from here.

Author:
Jianan Ou

getFlightsXML

public java.lang.String getFlightsXML(boolean depart,
                                      Airport airport,
                                      Date date)
An method that can get all the XML information about a flight from the server.

Parameters:
depart - select whether the departure information or the arrival information is needed
airport - the airport this flight would depart or arrive
date - the date this flight would depart or arrive
Returns:
the XML information about flight on the server
